game.ai.shared.rules

Class RulesFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.rules.RulesFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRuleCollection

    public class RulesFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRuleCollection
    This class to create ICommand of playing strategy for system
    Creating a random rules as library that can be applied for AIPlayer
    This class is used to check the rules that are defined by users
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

      java.lang.Object invokeCommand(ICommand command, IBoard board)
      This method will find its methods that can match with ICommand.getCondition()
      Then executing the method
      If in the collection of strategy has no a break command, the system will add it to user's strategy as last option
